Pre-Game Insights: Zimbabwe and India level at 1-1 in the five-match series with three T20Is to play.
Zimbabwe will be playing against India in the third T20I of the five-match series at the Harare Sports Club in Harare.
After registering a famous win in the first T20I, Zimbabwe lost the second match of the series to India by a big margin of 100 runs.
The Indian cricket team bounced back strongly from an early setback in the first T20I, ensuring that they level the series at 1-1.

With the expectation of a fresh pitch to be used for the third T20I of the Zimbabwe versus India series, the average first innings score of 157 runs could prove to be defendable, especially if the early morning moisture stays intact on the playing surface.
